title: 1/1,000th Scale World
alt: We're worried that a regular whale will get into a 30-foot-deep ocean trench section and filter-feed on all the tiny whales.
transcript:
[At the top of the image, inside the panel, a large title is floating in the air.]
RULESFor visitors to my 1/1,000th scale world1 meter = 1 km   1 ft = 1,000 ft[Each of the following rules is written near a character or point of interest on the map.]
